body.name: Logitech C920x Pro HD Webcam (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 40 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset. Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Full HD 1080p video calling and recording at 30 fps – You’ll make a strong impression when it counts with crisp, clearly detailed and vibrantly colored video.
Stereo audio with dual mics – Capture natural sound on calls and recorded videos.
Advanced capture software – Create and share video content easily with Logitech Capture.
HD lighting adjustment and autofocus – The C920x automatically fine-tunes to the lighting conditions to produce bright, razor-sharp images even if you’re in a low-light setting.
XSplit VCam – Remove, replace and blur your background without a Green Screen.
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal for solid little camera to use for print monitoring!
reviews.reviewText: Setup was easy once I found the proper software for the camera. Unfortunately they dont really give you any information with the amazon renewed version of this product. The link to the software that they had on the little paper it came with was a dead link and the cam didnt try to auto install when plugged in. After poking around online for a couple minutes I found the program I needed and got the thing setup initially. It updated firmware and than started showing up. Once it was setup and updated everything worked smoothly. At that point I connected the cam to my btt pad7 and input my url/ip settings. I can now use AI to monitor my prints while I am away or check in on them myself from anywhere (using mobileraker and octoanywhere). I do wish there were a way to manually focus it while its attached to my klipper pad, but the image is pretty good for using autofocus all things considered! Personally for 30ish dollars, I think its a great deal. Camera was in great condition, still covered in plastic wrap. The box it came in was a reprint, but I expected that. Honestly the only thing that would have made it better for me is if they had included a current software url link or qr code you can scan to take you to it. I could see some less experienced pc users having a little touble figuring out what they need to install because of the dead link. Its a good cam overall and I have no real complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for video conferences
reviews.reviewText: The camera provides excellent quality for a not so expensive price tag attached to it. Perfect for video conferences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good microphone, camera image quality is ok (doesn't do well for mixed lighting of presentations)
reviews.reviewText: What I really like about this camera is that the microphone has about a 270 degree pickup. That works nicely in a recording a presentation or lecture to record questions or input from a lot of people. What I'm not so thrilled with, is that it does not do well with mixed lighting situations. For example, a powerpoint display and a presenter who may adjust light levels. I find that once the light level saturates, it takes some effort to get it to reset and pick up the display again. I know that I'm asking a lot of a moderate priced camera for something that my institution should be handling as part of the infrastructure rather than foisting the expectation on employees, but here we are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved how this camera required no set up. Just plug in and go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item functions as advertised, arrived on time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have never had a need for a camera or mic on my work computer so when I had a new box built I deleted those items. Perfect timing for a pandemic to hit and shift the world to on-line meetings.The logitech webcam was a winner right out of the box. Initially I plugged it in and was disappointed because it didn't blink or beep or do anything to act like it was more than a dead lump of plastic and glass. But when I linked into the first meeting, it arose from the dead and worked brilliantly. Good sound, good picture, perfect. Most pleased.
